messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Am I just    being na√Øve?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/20/03 9:30:02 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... And I so believe that if I say do it yourself or my mother s favorite is there something
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/20/03 9:30:02 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> I think the better taste is the happiness and love they feel when I'm nice
> to
> them, as opposed to the slight fear and sorrow they might feel if I say "Do
>
> it yourself!"

And I so believe that if I say "do it yourself" or my mother's favorite "is
there something wrong with your hands?" then after a while they will stop
asking. I want to keep a good line of communication and not have them
thinking "I can't ask Mom she'll just say no." I want to be the yes person.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
